newsitem.title: USA: Resort Income liquidation assets down.
newsitem.headline: Resort Income liquidation assets down.

text.p: Resort Income Investors Inc said Friday its net assets in liquidation decreased to $4.6 million, or $1.10 a share, at March 31 from $4.8 million, or $1.15 a share at December 31.
The decrease was primarily due to payment of operating expenses, the company said.
Revenue for the first quarter was $9,030, compared to $28,934 in the first quarter of 1996.

The difference was due to termination of interest payments on the company's mortgage and demand loans by its affiliated borrowers and a reduction in the number of assets held for liquidation, the company said.
